creator: balavelocity@gmail.com
text:
Currently the system reads/retrieves cells based on cell index(row, column). The
JExcel application supports reading cells using its natural names(AB1, A1,
B1,etc.,) This functionality will reduce time to determine/search the exact cell.

This functionality may be included in HSSFSheet for a easy identification to the
end-user(developers).
you just didn't look hard enough. ask on the list
creator: poi-support@buni.org
